name: GrandMa Badass
storyline:
GrandMa certainly didn't imagine that she would have to spend such a rotten day.
And yet, she had started off so badly!

Woken up in the early morning by Marius, her hungry black cat, she will be disappointed and will understand that her day is not going to be the most pleasant...

Forced to face the dangers of the Coronavirus and the hazards of poverty, GrandMa will very quickly find herself in some dirty business, where she will have to deal with the underworld and the big banditry of her city...to find her cat, kidnapped on this dirty day...
summary:
Grandma Badass is a 2D cartoon point and click adventure game.

This point and click video game immerses you in the shoes of GrandMa, an old woman who will work to find her black cat Marius, missing and probably kidnapped.
